verses.text: \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, how \w my|strong="H1732"\w* foes \w have|strong="H1121"\w* increased! How many rise \w up|strong="H1121"\w* \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*!

\w Many|strong="H7227"\w* say \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, “\w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H6965"\w* deliver \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.” Selah \f + \fr 3:2 \ft Selah or Interlude is probably a musical or literary term; here and throughout the Psalms.\f*

\w But|strong="H7227"\w* \w You|strong="H5315"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w are|strong="H7227"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* shield around \w me|strong="H5315"\w*, \w my|strong="H5315"\w* glory, \w and|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H7227"\w* \w One|strong="H7227"\w* \w who|strong="H5315"\w* lifts \w my|strong="H5315"\w* head.

\w To|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* cry \w aloud|strong="H7311"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w He|strong="H3068"\w* answers \w me|strong="H7311"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* holy mountain. Selah

\w I|strong="H3068"\w* lie \w down|strong="H7121"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* sleep; \w I|strong="H3068"\w* wake \w again|strong="H6030"\w*, \w for|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* sustains \w me|strong="H6963"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* fear \w the|strong="H3588"\w* myriads \w set|strong="H5564"\w* \w against|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H5564"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w every|strong="H3068"\w* side.

Arise, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*! Save \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*! Strike \w all|strong="H5439"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* enemies \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* jaw; \w break|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* teeth \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* wicked.

\w Salvation|strong="H3467"\w* belongs \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*; \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* blessing \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H7563"\w*. Selah
